ðŸ“– Summary: SourceGit is an open-source, cross-platform GUI client for Git, designed to provide a user-friendly interface for managing Git repositories on Windows, macOS, and Linux. It offers a wide range of Git commands through a visual interface, supports customization, and includes advanced features like GitFlow, Git LFS, and AI-assisted commit message generation.
